   - https://strimzi.io/
   - https://github.com/strimzi/strimzi-kafka-operator/
      - https://github.com/strimzi/strimzi-kafka-operator/tree/0.45.0/helm-charts/helm3/strimzi-kafka-operator

```shell
kubectl get crds | grep kafka.strimzi.io | awk '{print $1}' | xargs -r kubectl delete crd
```
